selection_logic.rule: BK1 requires minimal documentation per BR18 §496
selection_logic.reason: Simple buildings under 50m² with low fire risk

document_descriptions.START: Starterklæring - Declaration from certified fire consultant
document_descriptions.ITT: Installationsteknisk tilsyn - Technical supervision of installations

excluded_documents.reason: BK1 projects are exempt from detailed fire strategy and documentation requirements

notes: This is the minimum documentation package. BK1 is for simple buildings where fire risk is minimal and standard solutions are sufficient.
